allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "$body = @{
    action = ''scan''
    id_token = ''TEST_TOKEN_12345''
    ts_client = ''2024-01-01T09:00:00''
    lat = 37.5
    lng = 127.0
    ua = ''PowerShell Client''
} | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbyKpeLCbtfoV6nqvYPynM7xcnTKJ2DPgIbN9RK6eaq-O4K86RJlIaXFJQG5EZXDOrlB2Q/exec'' -Method Post -Body $body -ContentType ''application/json''")
